sentence: The map’s swing districts are held by Allentown-area Democrat Susan Wild and Republican Brian Fitzpatrick of suburban Philadelphia’s Bucks County, while one in suburban Pittsburgh is empty since Democrat Conor Lamb is running instead for U.S. Senate.
author: Marc Levy and Mark Scolforo Associated Press
title: Pa. Supreme Court picks new Congressional map

author: Reading Eagle
title: Editorial: Congressional redistricting amounts to mixed bag

author: Reading Eagle
title: Editorial: Congressional redistricting amounts to mixed bag

author: MediaNews Group
title: Editorial: Congressional redistricting amounts to mixed bag
